nodes.text: Deneter was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories that had twenty satellites orbiting it. It was the site of a devastating battle during the Clone Wars. Due to the extensive damages caused by the war, the population emigrated to the Core Worlds, specifically Coruscant. It was located in a nebula near the Red Twins.

A few months after the fall of the Jedi Order, Ferus Olin, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Trever Flume were on the run from the bounty hunter, Boba Fett, who at the time was working for the Inquisitor Malorum. The trio outmaneuvered Fett and he was tricked into crash-landing his ship Slave I on Deneter.
